nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure employed a feminine GL vendor droid as a translator in his palace on the planet Tatooine. When Darth Maul and the Shadow Collective attacked Jabba's Palace to force an allegiance between the Hutt Clan and the Shadow Collective, the translator droid informed Maul that Jabba had agreed to work with their criminal alliance.
